name: avodocs
description: Official Manual for the Avolites Titan software
author: Avolites

scripts.build: node ../parse/search.js && node-sass scss/custom.scss static/custom.css --output-style expanded && docusaurus-build
scripts.app-build: node-sass app/scss/nav.scss app/sources/local/nav.css --output-style compressed && npm run build
scripts.app-sass: node-sass app/scss/nav.scss app/sources/local/nav.css --output-style compressed && node-sass --watch app/scss/nav.scss app/sources/local/nav.css --output-style compressed
scripts.sass: node-sass scss/custom.scss static/custom.css --output-style expanded && node-sass --watch scss/custom.scss static/custom.css --output-style expanded
